LanguageData.cider.label: Shinzee's Apple cider
LanguageData.rum.label: REinstein's Rum
LanguageData.Wine.label: Ramsi's wine
LanguageData.Wine.description: A sweet alcohol from grapes. From Ramsi's Private Reserves often stolen and smuggled.
LanguageData.strawberrywine.label: Spoon's Berry Wine
LanguageData.strawberrywine.description: The artist Spoonshortage had two passions in life. Art and her love of Strawberry wine. So much so that she spent her vast wealth developing her own brand. It quickly spread across the Rim, as the best and only brand to drink. It is a sweet, pinkish alcohol from strawberries.
LanguageData.saki.label: WHiZ Sake
LanguageData.saki.description: A crisp, refreshing alcohol from rice.
LanguageData.vodka.label: Syntria Vodka
LanguageData.vodka.description: Really just a knock off of the brand Syntria. A clear, potatoe based alcohol.
LanguageData.tequila.label: Kitty's Tequila
LanguageData.tequila.description: A potent liquor made of agave. It has a picture of what looks like a naked and inebriated female cat person on the bottle. Once discovered by a certain Orassan, she quickly perfected the recipe and it became a very popular drink on Orassia and developed an even more storied reputation.
LanguageData.whisky.label: Quill18's Whiskey
LanguageData.whisky.description: Quill number 18 whiskey. Takes 18 years to age this drink to perfection. Tho cheap knockoffs have been made to add flavors to speed up the process. A golden, corn based alcohol.
